patterns: What does Preorder or Forthcoming mean
responses: Items marked as 'Preorder' or 'Forthcoming' are expected to be released soon and you can pre-book them with sellers. Such items will be shipped after their official release by the seller with whom you've pre-booked them.

patterns: How can I claim warranty for my product
